page.title: 14 Child's Evening- Boars Hill
page.content: After walking home from school at 3 p.m. I let myself in as my mum is not usually home from work. I get myself a glass of milk, one cracker with butter on it and two with cheese on them. I usually watch television until my mum, two sisters and dad come home. Sometimes I watch a hospital series called "Young Doctors" but it is often quite boring. I like the childrens' programmes, especially cartoon films, I like animal cartoons best. When mum comes home she gets dinner ready, we often have stew followed by a pie and coffee with chocolate. After dinner Dad and I often go to the recreation field and play tennis. After watching some more television I usually go to bed at about 9 p.m.
